welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mill Hill, UK! Get ready to experience the charming and historic city known for its beautiful countryside and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mill Hill has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and its partners.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45 minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves all commercial flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
